headline: Marsh McLennan Declares Quarterly Cash Dividend
summary: NEW YORK, March 12, 2025--The Board of Directors of Marsh McLennan (NYSE: MMC) today declared a quarterly dividend of $0.815 per share on outstanding common stock, payable on May 15, 2025 to stockholders of record on April 3, 2025.

headline: Fidelity Select Financials Portfolio Q4 2024 Review
summary: For the three months ending December 31, 2024, the fund gained 9.45%, topping MSCI US IMI Financials 5% Capped Linked Index and significantly outpacing the broadly based S&P 500Â® index.
